net.sf.iptablesJava.rules

Class Rule

  • Object
    • net.sf.iptablesJava.rules.Command
      • net.sf.iptablesJava.rules.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Command
implements Cloneable
    A rule for the firewall. You can specify the generic rule options, a protocol matcher(-p option), a target (-j option) and additional matcher(-m option)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String chainname
      The chainName field can be written only by the rule itself and by other classes in the same package
